channel.title: Classic2.runescape.com/loader.jar
channel.description:
Jagex has always hosted:
The client at [url=http://classic2.runescape.com/rsclassic.jar]classic2.runescape.com/rsclassic.jar[/url] The cache loader which uses JAGGRAB at [url=http://classic2.runescape.com/loader.jar]classic2.runescape.com/loader.jar[/url]
However, the loader seems to have moved from that location (assuming they are still using it in the newly updated client). The client location still exists, however.
Anyone know the new link to it...?

item.title: Classic2.runescape.com/loader.jar
item.dc:creator: @Zoso1 Zoso_
item.description:
@Zoso1 wrote:

Oh kk, thanks for the reply.

Read full topic

item.title: Classic2.runescape.com/loader.jar
item.dc:creator: @RSCRevolution RSCRevolution
item.description:
@RSCRevolution wrote:

They don’t have a loader anymore.

<applet name="RuneScape Classic" id=game width="100%" height="100%" archive=rsclassic-1091943135.jar code=client.class mayscript>

You can grab the client from http://classic2.runescape.com/rsclassic-1091943135.jar

Read full topic

item.title: Classic2.runescape.com/loader.jar
item.dc:creator: @Zoso1 Zoso_
item.description:
@Zoso1 wrote:

Jagex has always hosted:

The client at classic2.runescape.com/rsclassic.jar
The cache loader which uses JAGGRAB at classic2.runescape.com/loader.jar

However, the loader seems to have moved from that location (assuming they are still using it in the newly updated client).
The client location still exists, however.

Anyone know the new link to it…?
